name: Jamon!
description:
Fast paced game where the goal is to collect Jamon while trying to stay alive by avoiding baddies. Get a Highscore and submit to online Leaderboards. 

Earn Achievements and Unlock playable characters with Unique abilities . 

Features
❖Google Play Games integration
❖Online Leaderboard
❖Achievements
❖Unlockable Characters with more to come!

You must sign in through Google Play Games in order to unlock achievements, submit to leaderboards and change to the different playable characters.

This game was initially made in under a Day for the first Ever Jam-Bon game jam. 

Game is simple to play - use mouse to move up and down(inverted). Press for fullscreen on desktop. 

Touch the screen on android. 

Possible Additions:
  • more enemy variations 
  • particles!- (really wanted to add but ran out of time)
  • different backgrounds!
  • different playable characters
